title: Imposition of Restrictions (Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) Pandemic) (No. 3) Instrument, 2020

provisions.title: Extension of restrictions on travel to Ghana
provisions.content: (1) The borders of Ghana, by air, land and sea, are closed to human traffic for a further period of two weeks, with effect from midnight on 5th April, 2020. The borders of Ghana, by air, land and sea, are closed to human traffic for a further period of two weeks, with effect from midnight on 5th April, 2020. (2) Subparagraph (1) does not apply to the transportation of goods, supplies and cargo to Ghana. Subparagraph (1) does not apply to the transportation of goods, supplies and cargo to Ghana.

provisions.title: Review of restrictions
provisions.content: Where the exigencies of the situation require, the duration of the restriction specified under paragraph 1 (1) may be varied in accordance with subsection (2) of section 4 ofthe Imposition of Restrictions Act, 2020 (Act 1012).Nana Addo Dankwa Akufo-AddoPresident of the Republic of Ghana Where the exigencies of the situation require, the duration of the restriction specified under paragraph 1 (1) may be varied in accordance with subsection (2) of section 4 ofthe Imposition of Restrictions Act, 2020 (Act 1012).
